uhh_lt.newsleak.resources

Class HooverResource

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.uima.resource.Resource_ImplBase
      • org.apache.uima.fit.component.Resource_ImplBase
        • uhh_lt.newsleak.resources.HooverResource
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.apache.uima.fit.component.ExternalResourceAware, org.apache.uima.resource.Resource

    public class HooverResource
extends org.apache.uima.fit.component.Resource_ImplBase
    Provides shared functionality and data for the @see uhh_lt.newsleak.reader.HooverElasticsearchReader. This resource connects directly to Hoover's elasticsearch index via a Jest client.
